The example sentence included in Google: s search results for the definition of the word "parasite" showed how the term could be used in a derogatory fashion to describe a capitalist.
Former U: S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich criticized Google on Twitter for providing an inaccurate definition of the word "parasite" as a "capitalist."
Google provides links and information fr: such as Oxford University Press, and does not write its own dictionary entries.
